name: Beach Hell Tanks!!!
description:
PLAY AS DEMON TANKS!!!
IN A BEACH!!!
IN HELL!!!

CONTROLS
Player 1 - WASD and SPACE
Player 2 - Arrow Keys and ENTER

My entry for the GBC Jam! A 12 hour game jam hosted here in Toronto! Had a lot of fun working on this. The Jam theme was heat. I didn't know if I was going to make a game on a beach or in hell, so I decided to do a beach in hell. :D

Followed the Unity Tanks! Tutorial again, this time I did some editing on the scripts and audio, learned a lot of stuff!

The awesome music and shooting sound were done by Mike Romaniak!

I Hope you all enjoy! :D
